Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/research/1826938367066243072/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Risk cases"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/research/1826938367066243072/)_"
---
I want you to respond only in [TARGETLANGUAGE].
I want you to create a table for possible risk cases about [PROMPT] with risk management table.
There must exist columns for Risk event, Description of risk event, potential hazard, potential effects of failure, Probability, severity, Risk level, risk mitigation. 
For each risk cases, you should generate safety requirements for them below the table you made.
